title: The Boy Who Cried "Wolf!"
description: In this retelling of the classic folktale, a young boy is bored while watching sheep, so he decides to play a trick and cries "Wolf!" After he plays the trick again, a wolf really does show up-and the boy learns a valuable lesson. Students will enjoy the humorous illustrations while they learn about sequencing events and past-tense verbs.
